sentences.en: Bill: Why , did you flunk the math test?
sentences.cn: 比尔: 你数学测验不及格 吗 ?

sentences.en: Both steps would require huge courage by the two leaders; both may well flunk.
sentences.cn: 这两步都需要两位领导人莫大的勇气; 而且失败的可能性很大.

sentences.en: But let’s face it, life is filled with all kinds of tests — some you ace and some you flunk — so at some point you have to get used to it.
sentences.cn: 但，让我们面对它，生命中充满了各种各样的考试——有一些你第一而有一些你却不及格——因此，从某点说，你必须要适应它。

sentences.en: But let’s face it, life is filled with all kinds of tests — some you ace and some you flunk — so at some point you have to get used to it.
sentences.cn: 但是，我们得面对现实，生活充满了各种考试——有些你是好手，有些却不及格——所以从某个角度而言，必须习惯这种情况。

sentences.en: I appreciated the warning, but, honestly, I'd rather flunk the class than go through that again.
sentences.cn: 我非常感激这个警告, 然而, 说实话, 我宁可不及格也不会再做这样的事了.

sentences.en: If flunk out I can always transfer to Engineering.
sentences.cn: 一旦不合格,马上可以转工程专业.

sentences.en: If he is no good, flunk him.
sentences.cn: 如果他表现不好, 给他不及格.

sentences.en: Of course there are some who flunk this life too commonplace to be worthwhile.
sentences.cn: 自然,也有人将不屑于这平庸.
托尼上学期化学考试不及格。

sentences.en: You mustn't flunk others , or you will be flunked out.
sentences.cn: 不能再出差错, 否则就得退学了.

sentences.en: You're going to flunk if you don't study.
sentences.cn: 如果你不读书你会不及格.

phrases.tran_cn: 除名，退学：因考试成绩不合格而从学校或该门课程中除掉或被除掉学习资格

trans.tran_cn: 评定（某人）不及格，（因不及格而） 退学
<美><口>，（使）（考试、某学科的成绩等）不及格
